alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 15 at 2:14AM MST until November 16 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches expected, mainly above 9000 feet in elevation. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range above 9000 feet in elevation. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Falling and blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and produce slick road conditions. Hikers, campers, and hunters could easily become disoriented.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
